question.title: Android Quickstep crashes with other launchers
question.body:
I recently got the T-mobile Revvl 8 Pro, and decided to switch to Nova Launcher and away from the default quickstep. The new launcher works fine, but I noticed a persistent crash. When I swipe up to see all recent apps and open one of them it will not open that app, and sometimes quickstep says it stopped. The apps are fine, if i open them from icon, they come up just fine. I did a log dump and saw this:

12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime: Process: com.android.launcher3, PID: 10416
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime: java.lang.ClassCastException: com.android.quickstep.RecentsActivity cannot be cast to com.android.launcher3.Launcher
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at com.android.quickstep.views.TaskView.onClick(TaskView.kt:959)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at com.android.quickstep.views.TaskView.access$onClick(TaskView.kt:111)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at com.android.quickstep.views.TaskView$1.onClick(TaskView.kt:465)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.view.View.performClick(View.java:8028)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.view.View.performClickInternal(View.java:8005)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.view.View.-$$Nest$mperformClickInternal(Unknown Source:0)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.view.View$PerformClick.run(View.java:31234)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:959)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:100)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.os.Looper.loopOnce(Looper.java:232)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:317)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:8779)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:582)
12-18 12:12:13.402 10178 10416 10416 E AndroidRuntime:  at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:898)

Oddly trying any other launchers, like smart launcher 6, action launcher, aio launcher, and others still has this.
